Mod.name: intense_baseball_v1.4.11
Mod.author: meso
Mod.description: batter up with a multitude of balls!

triplet.name: Shrapnel Baseball
triplet.description: A baseball that explodes if hit.

whirlwind.name: Chilling Baseball
whirlwind.description: Slowing aura. Freezes opponents. Gives opponents frostbite on contact.

effects.title: Frostbite
effects.text: Greatly reduced knockback but increased damage.

spello.name: Psychic Baseball
spello.description: High knockback and mediocre damage. Fragile.

effects.title: Presence
effects.text: Has three 1 damage orbs orbiting it which are hard to deflect.

fere.name: Brittle Baseball
fere.description: Gives opponents frostbite on contact. Shatters into smaller pieces.

effects.title: Frostbite
effects.text: Greatly reduced knockback but increased damage.

effects.title: Presence
effects.text: Has six 0.5 damage orbs orbiting it which are hard to deflect.

varie.name: Foresight Baseball
varie.description: Higher knockback and no damage. Only triggers if an opponent walks in.

shatter.name: Shattering Baseball
shatter.description: A baseball that shatters into less pieces that deal 1 bleeding damage.
